Html:
Hello reader

I am not a programmer but managed to get into vb.net and dotspatial and combine it into a working programm.
Now I want to add to this project some NAudio features.

I have a list of adresses values in octaves stored in a table.. what i want to achieve is that

1) A chosen traffic-noise sample must be equalized based on these values....
2) The sample must be lowered in volume
3) An outputmeter should show the outputted sound-value

Who has experience in programming such things and is willingly to help?

Feel free to contact me.

Greetings Joska
